description: Surrogate identifier for the color record, used as the primary key for lookups and relationships.
Date-time when this color record was created or last updated, stored as yyyymmddhhmmssSSS digits; likely UTC; confirm with SME.
Human-readable vehicle color name or combination (e.g., base/trim). Used to classify assets for reporting and search.
Identifier of the corresponding color in a legacy system; used for migration and cross-system mapping; confirm with SME.
Name of the legacy source table for this record; used to trace data lineage; confirm with SME.
